post.text:
#速报#
# 消息称台湾敲定一项F16战机军购案，岛内网友讽：榨汁机操作，美国与民进党联手榨到台湾身无分文
据台湾“中央社”等台媒报道，有消息人士向法新社证实，美国武器制造商洛克希德马丁（Lockheed Martin）获得10年总价共620亿美元的F-16V订单，其中要提供给台湾的部分已经定案。
https://taiwan.huanqiu.com/article/3zTUCCwxRTJ
***
# Taiwan Finalizes $62bn Purchase Of F-16 Jets From Lockheed Martin
Taiwan finalized the purchase of F-16 fighter jets from US aircraft manufacturer Lockheed Martin on Friday, a source confirmed to AFP, in a $62 billion, 10-year deal sure to anger Beijing.
https://www.barrons.com/news/taiwan-finalizes-massive-purchase-of-f-16-jets-from-lockheed-martin-01597444204?tesla=y
